channel.title: PvP Masters Reborn! Free Chaotic Weapon when you join!
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]PvP Masters Reborn![/SIZE][/CENTER]
[URL=http://"http://pvpmasters.net"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://pvpmasters.net/forums/"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://pvpmasters.net/play.html"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://pvpmasters.net/pvpmasters.jar"]Download[/URL]
PvP Masters used to be a very popular RSPS around 2 years ago until we shut down. Ranked top 20 on Runelocus, and higher on other toplists. I have decided to have my old Server reborn and make it more modern. We have an extremely stable source on a 16gb RAM Dedicated Server, you wont lag or disconnect while playing. The Unique thing about our server is that you get a free chaotic of your choice when you make a new account. Features: 3 floors of Security Stonghold Unique Places like Ancient Caverns 100% Resizable and Fullscreen, Webclient FullScreen 100% Corp with Correct Map 100% Tormented Demons, All 3 attack Styles work Vote4Cash System with 4 choosable rewards, Includes shop Multiple PK Areas Custom Unique Zombies Minigame, completely different from released Tutorial. Duel Arena, Pest Control, and more. Flawless Combat, Nothing is Over Powered, Balanced Formulas Multiple Quests to do Helper Status Available Custom Crowns for all ranks Unique Donator Zone Pretty Much Everything else PI includes. ;)
Media: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390868/quest.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390876/stronghold.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390865/fullscreen.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390885/caverns.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390886/pest.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390889/zombies.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390891/tds.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390893/fishing.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390935/agility.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390897/thieving.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390899/emotes.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390901/music.png[/img] A Few Shops: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390905/vote.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390912/pk1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390931/pk2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3390916/donator.png[/img]
I hope you decide to play, please if you do not like my server don't leave hateful comments. If you like it play, if you don't leave.
We opened the server yesterday and so far have gotten up to 13 players, with 9 being average.

item.title: PvP Masters Reborn! Free Chaotic Weapon when you join!
item.dc:creator: @PvPMasters PvPMasters
item.description:
@PvPMasters wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=6]PvP Masters Reborn![/SIZE][/CENTER]

Website
Forums
Webclient
Download

PvP Masters used to be a very popular RSPS around 2 years ago until we shut down. Ranked top 20 on Runelocus, and higher on other toplists. I have decided to have my old Server reborn and make it more modern. We have an extremely stable source on a 16gb RAM Dedicated Server, you wont lag or disconnect while playing. The Unique thing about our server is that you get a free chaotic of your choice when you make a new account.
Features:
3 floors of Security Stonghold
Unique Places like Ancient Caverns
100% Resizable and Fullscreen, Webclient FullScreen
100% Corp with Correct Map
100% Tormented Demons, All 3 attack Styles work
Vote4Cash System with 4 choosable rewards, Includes shop
Multiple PK Areas
Custom Unique Zombies Minigame, completely different from released Tutorial.
Duel Arena, Pest Control, and more.
Flawless Combat, Nothing is Over Powered, Balanced Formulas
Multiple Quests to do
Helper Status Available
Custom Crowns for all ranks
Unique Donator Zone
Pretty Much Everything else PI includes.

I hope you decide to play, please if you do not like my server don’t leave hateful comments. If you like it play, if you don’t leave.
